starwars.content: General Dodonna: May the Force be with you.
Obi Wan Kenobi: These aren’t the droids you’re looking for.
Han Solo: Great, kid. Don’t get cocky.
Princess Leia: Aren’t you a little short for a Stormtrooper?
Yoda: Do, or do not. There is no try.
Yoda: Train yourself to let go of everything you fear to lose.
Obi-Wan Kenobi: Don’t give in to hate. That leads to the dark side.
Han Solo: Listen, Big Deal. You got another problem. Women always figure out the truth. Always.
Padmé Amidala: So this is how liberty dies. With thunderous applause.
Ahsoka Tano: I like firsts. Good or bad, they’re always memorable.
Obi-Wan Kenobi: If you strike me down, I shall become more powerful than you can possibly imagine.
Darth Vader: The circle is now complete. When I left you, I was but the learner; now I am the master.
Darth Vader: No, I am your father. Search your feelings. You know it to be true.
Darth Vader: I find your lack of faith disturbing.
Boba Fett: He’s no good to me dead.
Darth Maul: At last we will reveal ourselves to the Jedi. At last we will have revenge.
Darth Sidious: Execute Order 66.
Darth Sidious: So Be It... Jedi. Now young Skywalker, you will die.
Darth Sidious: Everything that has transpired has done so according to my design.
Darth Sidious: Oh, No, My Young Jedi. You Will Find That It Is You Who Are Mistaken, About A Great Many Things.
Darth Sidious: You, Like Your Father, Are Now...Mine!
Rio Durant: I’m tellin ya, you will never have a deeper sleep than curled up in a Wookiee’s lap.
The Mandalorian: I can bring you in warm, or I can bring you in cold.
The Client: Bounty hunting is a complicated profession.
Kuill: I will help you. I have spoken.
The Mandalorian: I’m a Mandalorian. Weapons are part of my religion.
The Armorer: When one chooses to walk the Way of the Mandalore, you are both hunter and prey.
Greef Karga: Come on, baby! Do the magic hand thing.
Cobb Vanth: I guess every once in a while both suns shine on a womp rat’s tail.
Boba Fett: I don’t want your armor. I want my armor.
The Mandalorian: No droids.
